review: Although slightly less powerful than the big-brother FireTV, this is a great and compact product for a bedroom TV. Loading it with your favourite apps (either from Amazon store or loaded via adb), this Stick gives you access to Netflix, Hulu Plus, Amazon Prime Video and much much more. Awesome products for a bargain price. Highly recommended!
